text: is a Japanese visual novel franchise by Rejet. Its first entry was released on October 11, 2012 for the PlayStation Portable system. == Gameplay == Seven games have been released: * Diabolik Lovers: Haunted Dark Bridal * Diabolik Lovers: More,Blood * Diabolik Lovers: Vandead Carnival * Diabolik Lovers: Dark Fate * Diabolik Lovers: Lunatic Parade * Diabolik Lovers: Lost Eden * Diabolik Lovers: Chaos Lineage == Plot == The main heroine, Yui Komori, was just a normal teenage girl in high school until her father, a priest, went to travel overseas for work. Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:2020s television series
title: Diabolik Lovers
